name: Smart meeting
description:
Ruthless dictatorship of Mirovlad Duck'in terrorize its own citizens. You play as an odd but honest and cheerful guy Oval'ny - Your wishes of better future and their support by others may lead to changes. Lead a peaceful protest to victory!

Move around by clicking on roads;
Enter green zones to aggitate bystanders;
Bystanders will check your readiness to fulfill their expectances by telling their thoughts on a meeting. You need to repeat sequence correctly. There are three response types and keys according to them:
Z - sceptical
X - neutral
C - cheerful

Game ends when You reach crowd of 50 people or lose them all and hit policecube.

Aware! Meet your expectances with development process:
13.06.2021: 0.1 version - base movement and gameplay mechanics, conceptual music and visuals, first playable prototype.
